reviews.review_msg: He was extremely unclear about his instructions. Take any other finance course except BUS 419 with him - absolute nightmare. Super confusing questions, very little instruction and no care for students. MAKE SURE TO AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!!

Extremely clear with what he expects you to learn and tells you exactly what will be on the exams. The course material isn't too difficult and important concepts are covered multiple times. Goes on rants and likes to discuss finance news in class. Definitely recommend!
Great prof! Wish I could take another class with her

One of the best professor I've ever had, she is always happy to help. Before the exams, she even offered online discussion room and answered questions in the mid-night. Her class is extremely helpful and useful. Make sure u do all the tasks she gives and you will do good.  I enjoyed her lectures.
Love this prof! One of the best at SFU! Not only does she know what she's talking about but she makes a genuine effort to make sure you do well if you sees you're a hardworking student.

Tara is one of the best profs on the business faculty. If you want to enjoy and understand Finance (not just memorize), she is the one you should take your course with. Very clear requirements, awesome attitude to students and very engaging lectures. Her classes are never boring.
i learned nothing in this class. Geoffrey will talk a lot about calculus and derivatives but tbh you don't learn anything that can be applied in the real world.

Very smart prof who will introduce you to financial engineering. Math is hard, but MT and final are easy if you listen and take notes in class (ALL answers are given in class). Free participation marks if you hand in all trades and math pretest. Presentation was easy and he tells you his expectations. Nice to students. Overall a great prof!
Very nice Prof. Same as 316 stuff. Homework style easy fill-in-the-blank midterm but lengthly dreadful killer real-life-case final. Last 3 lectures = no homework = no practice = no idea.
Decent prof but final exam was very unrealistic and amount learned in this course was very little in addition to Bus 316
Class average too high. Easy midterm but extremely hard final.  He is very very unclear when it comes to explaining.  Dont go to his classes.
Good Prof, his notes are so in-depth that there is no need for the textbook. Also, lectures are not productive since he goes over already completed solutions and assumes you know the process.
exactly like bus 316 with a slight add-on
Extremely easy midterm & extremely difficult final.

One of the greatest teacher in SFU. Very responsible teacher,well prepared for EVERY class.  Provide student with detail notes & examples. Give excellent lecture.  Very nice & friendly too.  One of my favourite teacher. Great finance prof. Highly recommended :>
